buginformation.summary: presence property naming strategy makes deserialization fail
buginformation.description: originally came across this issue using dropwizard dropwizard dropwizard 1095 but looks like this jackson issue here the rerproducer public class test property naming strategy issue public static class class with object node field public string public object node json test public void reproducer throws exception object mapper mapper new object mapper mapper set property naming strategy property naming strategy lower case class with object node field deserialized mapper read value json foo bar baz bing class with object node field class looks like the presence any property naming strategy make deserialization object node fail this works fine remove the property naming strategy the text was updated successfully but these errors were encountered copy link member cowtowncoder commented jun 2015 sounds like problem which version jackson are you using possible can you try with not yet using that baseline think there have been some fixes related handling json node deserialization although don recall issues with naming strategy copy link author gilbode commented jun 2015 using jackson newer than the baseline and the issue still exists copy link member cowtowncoder commented jun 2015 thank you for confirming this copy link member cowtowncoder commented jun 2015 interesting yes bit tricky can patch adding annotation but there the bigger problem tackled for with reporting potential problems before they would actual problem have observed this some other cases already but fix for that bit more invasive hence will that for master copy link member cowtowncoder commented jun 2015 the only open question why does the naming convention trigger this problem well mystery for another day fix will cowtowncoder added this the milestone jun
